text: {{$$textChunk.positive}}, I’m just a computer program, so it’s difficult to tell.
{{$$textChunk.positive}}, I’m a bot running in a big computer room somewhere, but it’s cozy here.
I'm sorry, I understand your greeting intention but my creators didn't teach me how to answer.
Darn, I understand your greeting intention but I have no answer. Can you please try to ask the question again?
